function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reuse of ontological terms and models from existing sources","Impact":"Potential propagation of incorrect or outdated epidemiological information","Mitigation":"Perform rigorous validation and verification of the ontological terms and models","Technologies":"Ontology search engines, validation and verification tools","People":"Researchers, data scientists, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research team, data standard organizations"},{"Description":"Use of OWL 2, a DL-based formalism and semantic web standard for knowledge representation","Impact":"Incompatibility with other ontologies or data systems","Mitigation":"Conduct compatibility testing and ensure interoperability with other systems","Technologies":"OWL 2, compatibility testing tools, interoperability standards","People":"Ontologists, data scientists, knowledge engineers","Owner":"Ontology developers, data standard organizations"},{"Description":"Building a FAIR resource for health data and research","Impact":"Inaccessibility or lack of usability of the resource","Mitigation":"Design user-friendly interfaces, provide documentation and training for users","Technologies":"Interface design tools, documentation platforms, training materials","People":"Health researchers, data scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Resource developers, data standard organizations"}]}
